articles.content: Babar Azam-led Pakistan has failed to live up to the expectations at the ongoing 50-over World Cup in India. The team kicked-off the campaign on a positive note and won the first two matches. However… [+2495 chars]

articles.title: Khamzat Chimaev claims he broke his hand in wild win over Kamaru Usman: ‘I couldn’t punch hard’ | UFC 294 - MMA Mania
articles.description: Khamzat Chimaev claims he suffered a broken hand in the first round of his win over Kamaru Usman at UFC 294.

articles.title: Match awards from Bayern Munich’s 3-1 win over Mainz - Bavarian Football Works
articles.description: A strong attacking display from the Bavarians. The defence, not so much.
articles.content:
Bayern Munich saw goals scattered between Kingsley Coman, Harry Kane, and Leon Goretzka, which could be a sign that the attack is finally clicking. 
Lets hope so.
